home.title: Welcome, Factchecker!
home.subtitle: Dega is an open source project that enables fact-checking organizations, pop-up news rooms around the world to build their own fact-checking portal without much technical expertise. The project is intended to aid & propagate hyperlocal 'Fact Checking', while conforming to the best practices of Fact Checking process.
